author: Mark Ellis
comment: Great app, but menu seems confusing, nothing aimed at notification for just watch or just phone, just seen to be one does all. For me i need more control over notification sound vibrate and popups for each device.
title: Confusing

author: sapphira chalkley
comment: The amount of times I forget my phone or not sure where I left is slightly embarrassing. But with this app, I can find it really easy. It even let's me know when I'm out of range.
title: Fantastic!

author: Salih Yasin
comment: App would not recognize that phone was connected to watch. Had to use another app I found.
title: Connection

author: Serhii Aksiutin
comment: But one more thing! Add mute it for some time. Like for 30 mins or one hour

reply.author: Kodeglam Mobile
reply.content: Bug fixed. Thank you.

title: Like it

author: David Solis
comment: It crashes on the watch.  It crashes on phone 10 times per day.  Annoying.
title: Keeps crashing.

author: Shawn O'Leary
comment: They need to be more clear about the fact that this app expires and needs to be purchased.
title: Trial wear

author: Janis Froehlig
comment: I just switched from a Gear Live to a G Watch (they are so not the same). The G Watch is triggering the disconnect notice within 18 inches of my phone. @@
title: Needs night hours

author: Dan Regev
comment: Does exactly what it supposes to do
title: Best combined watch and/or phone finder

author: B. G
comment: A poor app it doesn't work to find your smartwatch.
title: Tried to find my LG smartwatch with the app and it doesn't work , and don't buy the LG smartwatch because it has no sound at all , just stupid a smartwatch without sound pointless if u ever lose it , this is the LG smartwatch model # LGW100 cost $ 243 , a waste of money don't buy this watch !

author: Sheldon Hopkins
comment: Will notify when out of range...but when back in range it still triggers alarm as if out of range.
title: Works well...

author: Isaiah Costner
comment: Silent option now added!  Great app!

reply.author: Kodeglam Mobile
reply.content: Notification fix. It will operate depending on your phone settings when the phone and watch are disconnected.

title: Much Better Now

author: Scarlett Mccaffrey
comment: Confusing for me

author: Jordan Glover
comment: Perfect.

author: Josue Palmerin
comment: While this app is a good idea, design is left to desire. It basically does what is supposed to and you can turn off the annoying notifications. I would have rated more but all of a sudden the app claims that it has expired, while going premium does nothing. This I thought was a free app and the advertising confirms it there is also a donate to developer, I just don't get the going premium and expiration pop up. Please fix.

reply.author: Kodeglam Mobile
reply.content: Thank you for your advice. We will fix as soon as possible.

title: Fix app please

author: Stephen Pascua
comment: Unable to upgrade to premium.

reply.author: Kodeglam Mobile
reply.content: Sorry for the bug. We will check as soon as possible.

title: Bug

author: Bill Haskins
comment: Alarm is poorly implemented, using find my phone just hangs, and last location crashes app. Might be the WORST app I've paid for.

reply.author: Kodeglam Mobile
reply.content: Bug fixed. Thank you.

title: Crashorama

author: Rehan Uddin
comment: Didn't get a chance to evaluate even if it's a good app or not.  Terrible music keeps going off by default every 5mins. "Don't Again"  option doesn't work.  No option to change the music,  slow it down or just to et to vibrate..  Or nothing that I could within a good min.  Waste of effort on developer's part of he made it just for the music to take off!

reply.author: Kodeglam Mobile
reply.content: Notification fix. It will operate depending on your phone settings when the phone and watch are disconnected.

title: Terrible music

author: Wesley Patrick
comment: I thought this would be a good app just in case I needed it but I turned my watch off at work and it just would not stop sounding the alarm even after I hit the don't sound button or whatever. I can't have my phone going off every 10 mins st work. I'd get fired.

reply.author: Kodeglam Mobile
reply.content: Notification fix. It will operate depending on your phone settings when the phone and watch are disconnected.

author: Angela Jiang
comment: It does what it says it will do. Unfortunately, I found it to be too annoying to keep on my phone. It goes off every time I lose connection or turn off the watch. The sound is loud and the volume cannot be adjusted. The "don't again" button doesn't work half the time. It would be nice if there are options for the volume of the alarm.

reply.author: Kodeglam Mobile
reply.content: Notification fix. It will operate depending on your phone settings when the phone and watch are disconnected.

title: Annoying and loud

author: Billy Fernando
comment: One of the apps that offer the best feature for finding phone and watch. But I seconded everyone here. Alarm keep going off every several minutes while I'm at work, I don't know if it because it got disconnected or what but it's annoying, I uninstalled the app so I can still keep my job. Will install it again once it got better.

reply.author: Kodeglam Mobile
reply.content: Notification fix. It will operate depending on your phone settings when the phone and watch are disconnected.

title: Cool idea, but...

author: Walker Dow
comment: Lost my watch, so I installed this app to find it. The locate watch option did nothing. I eventually located my watch the old fashioned way, and tested the "locate watch" feature. Absolutely no response from my Huawei Watch.
title: Installed to find my watch, didn't work.

author: Austin Greenway
comment: This is a good app but I uninstalled it. Most of the permissions are reasonable, but why do you need access to my files and why would you need to modify or delete them? If it didn't require access to my files, I would purchase the premium version.
title: works good, but...

comment: Great design, love the simplicity. Gives you No options as far as turning the service off and switching the alarm for a vibrate or a visual notification.
